title: How much did the stars, for example Ronald Reagan recently pictured in the SN, get paid for appearing at the Azalea Festival?
text:
Here's a link to a story about the stars at the Azalea Festival and their pay:



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20030404/NEWS/304040314



Essentially, the movie studios paid their stars to do publicity such as appearing at festivals in the past. Today the festival pays travel expenses and buys meals for celebrity guests but does not pay appearance fees.
